# Ashish Malla — Personal Portfolio

> Engineer, community builder, and hackathon enthusiast.

## About

Ashish Malla (username: IM45145V) is an engineer with a passion for AI/ML, web development, and open source. Currently pursuing an MBA at IIM Ranchi. Previously completed B.Tech from SNIST.

## Current Roles

- Events Lead at Hackerabad (1300+ members, 20+ events)
- GitHub Campus Expert
- Junior Executive Member at Alumni Relations Committee, IIM Ranchi

## Past Roles

- Postman Student Leader
- Tech Lead at AI Club SNIST
- Core Organizer & Mentor at HackPrix
- Organizer at CodeDay Hyderabad
- Ground Volunteer & Discord Team at OpinHacks
- Streamlit Student Ambassador
- Defang Campus Advocate

## Skills

Python, Go, GitHub, Postman, Docker, AI/ML, Web Development

## Speaking

- MLOps Introduction at AI Verse by CodeWaveHub (Presentation)
- APIs 101 using Postman at ABCD II by Hackerabad (Workshop)
- APIs Acceleration: Turbocharge Your Hackathon Projects at HackPrix (Workshop)
